Control.Name: Back
Control.Tooltip: Go back to the categories view.

Control.Name: DisableCheck
Control.Tooltip: Disables the unit.

Control.Name: CombatDisableCheck
Control.Tooltip: Hide when the player is in combat.

Control.Name: OccludedDisableCheck
Control.Tooltip: Hide when the unit is occluded from view.

Control.Name: ShowIconCheck
Control.Tooltip: Shows the unit's icon.

Control.Name: ShowNameCheck
Control.Tooltip: Shows the unit's name.

Control.Name: RangeFontCheck
Control.Tooltip: Colors the unit's font by the range color when the unit is within the range limit.

Control.Name: ShowLinesCheck
Control.Tooltip: Shows the unit's line.

Control.Name: ShowOutlineCheck
Control.Tooltip: Shows the unit's line outline.

Control.Name: RangeIconCheck
Control.Tooltip: Colors the unit's icon by the range color when the unit is within the range limit.

Control.Name: ShowDistanceCheck
Control.Tooltip: Shows the unit's distance

Control.Name: ShowOffScreenLineCheck
Control.Tooltip: Shows the unit's line even if the unit is offscreen.

Control.Name: RangeLineCheck
Control.Tooltip: Colors the unit's line by the range color when the unit is within the range limit.

Control.Text: This probably needs to be a drop down list
Control.Name: FontText
DisplayLabel
Control.Tooltip: If this value is set, the display name will be used in place of the unit's name.

Control.Name: DisplayText
Control.Tooltip: If this value is set, the display name will be used in place of the unit's name.

Control.Name: ZDistanceText
Control.Tooltip: Determines how the max for each item is calculated. Valid options are nil, quest, challlenge, and category. nil - unlimited. quest - limits per quest. challenge - limits per challenge. category - limits per category.

Control.Name: LimitByLabel
Control.Tooltip: Determines how the max for each item is calculated. Valid options are nil, quest, challlenge, and category. nil - unlimited. quest - limits per quest. challenge - limits per challenge. category - limits per category.

Control.Name: DrawUpdateControls
Control.Tooltip: The amount of time between screen redraws.

Control.Name: FastUpdateControls
Control.Tooltip: The amount of time between the updates for units close to the player.

Control.Name: SlowUpdateControl
Control.Tooltip: The amount of time between the updates for units far from the player.

Control.Name: InAreaTextBackground
Control.Tooltip: The distance to a quest location marker before you are considered "in the area" and the location marker is hidden.

Control.Name: DefaultButton
Control.Tooltip: Restores the settings back to default.
